text:
<@U26AKMZ19> no worries, I have this RichText component inside of an accordion (so it is initially collapsed/hidden):
```           <RichText
              className="col-span-12 md:col-start-3 md:col-span-10 pt-0 pb-6"
              fieldPath={`faqs[${index}].answer`}
            />```
works fine in production, but shows no content over proxy. The data is there, other content shows up (like headings in the accordion) but the inner accordion RichText content does not load over proxy.

Hey HubSpot folks, I'm getting a build error when I try to deploy.
```[ERROR] The build failed due to an internal error with id `39c5e657-a725-4a18-823d-0580c8832f8c```
any idea what might be going on here?
thanks for reporting Andrey, we are looking into it.

<@UAYBXDG4U> I think I accidentally figured it out...it looks like
```  host_template_types: ['PAGE', 'BLOG_POST', 'LANDING_PAGE'],```
is wrong in some way. If I set it to just 'PAGE' then that works
(or could be a coincidence I guess)

This :point_up: brings up a question: Where should we report bugs/issues with cms-react? Iâ€™ve tried reporting what I think is a fairly serious problem <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04AY1H2204/p1719434954126079?thread_ts=1719434863.201469&cid=C04AY1H2204|here in Slack> and also <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react/issues/70|in the cms-react repo on Github>. I see no activity (from an HS engineer) in either place and so I have no idea if anyone from HS has seen it.
